Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to the issuance of operating certificates for certain providers of chemical dependence services
Summary: Provides for the issuance of operating certificates for federally organized, operated or authorized Indian health service facilities with addictions programs to operate as providers of chemical dependence services following certain attestations.
LawCode: Amd ยง32.09, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the issuance of operating certificates for certain providers of chemical dependence services
